# sonatyperepo_capability_audit (Resource)

Manage Capability: Audit
		
**NOTE:** Requires Sonatype Nexus Repostiory 3.82.0 or later - see [Release Notes](https://help.sonatype.com/en/sonatype-nexus-repository-3-82-0-release-notes.html).

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "sonatyperepo_capability_audit" "cap_audit" {
  notes   = "These are notes from Terraform"
  enabled = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether the Capability is enabled.

### Optional

- `notes` (String) Optional notes about configured capability.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The internal ID of the Capability.
- `last_updated` (String)

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
# Import an existing Audit Capability into Terraform State.
#
# NOTE: The CAPABILITY_ID can be obtained from the datasource.

# Example
terraform import sonatyperepo_capability_audit.cap_audit CAPABILITY_ID
```
